text: Great news! Two Indonesia-Dutch research projects on Resilient Healthcare Systems awarded! 🎉💡 These projects will help strengthen the Indonesian healthcare system against infectious diseases, ultimately reducing economic and social costs of pandemics. 🚑💰 It's great to see multiple stakeholders involved, including public authorities, healthcare workers, farmers, and community members. 🤝 Let's work together to make the Indonesian healthcare system more resilient! 💪
